content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Completed Headquarters - Trilateral
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Modifies the Completed Headquarters mod to use three large sections rather than a single contiguous ring.
